report_definition.name: Concentrazione media oraria Adsorbitore AS-130:RC-104
report_definition.sql_command: SELECT format (DateValue([TagTimeStamp])+(Hour([TagTimeStamp])/24),"dd-mm-yyyy HH:MM") AS Data, Format(Avg(OPCValuesTags.TagValue),"0.00") AS AvgOfTagValue FROM OPCValuesTags WHERE (((OPCValuesTags.Quality)=192) AND ((OPCValuesTags.TagTimeStamp)>=datevalue('%date_from%') And (OPCValuesTags.TagTimeStamp)< datevalue('%date_to%')+1)) GROUP BY DateValue([TagTimeStamp]), Hour([TagTimeStamp]), OPCValuesTags.TagID HAVING (((OPCValuesTags.TagID)=42))
